# Schema: `CreateGitRepoRequest`

Request payload for registering a Git repository.

- Type: `object`
- Required fields: `auth_token`, `branch`, `url`

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `auth_token` | `string` | `true` | Personal access token or deploy key for Git authentication. |
| `branch` | `string` | `true` | - |
| `path` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `url` | `string` | `true` | - |
